text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1098 (Deemed Approved December 6, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4768

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
October 21,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Mrs. Tamora Papas to the Board of Real Estate
Appraisers.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Real Estate Appraisers Tamora Papas Confirmation
Resolution of 2014''.
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Tamora Papas
520 N Street, S.W., #S320
Washington, D.C. 20024
(Ward 6)
.
as a licensed real estate appraiser member of the Board of Real Estate Appraisers, established by
section 1002 of the Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure Act of 1998,
effective April 20, 1999 (D.C. Law 12-261; D.C. Official Code § 47-2853.06(g)), and in
accordance with section 2 of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law
2-142; D.C. Official Code § 1-523.01), for a term to end June 26, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of Real
Estate
Appraisers
Tamora Papas
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
